explanation: The original code only checked for two '#' in the same row (S1 == "##" or S2 == "##") but did not check for two '#' in the same column. That caused column cases like "#." / "#." or ".#" / ".#" to be missed. I fixed the first if-line by adding checks for both columns: (S1[0] == '#' and S2[0] == '#') and (S1[1] == '#' and S2[1] == '#').
